has research problem.from sentence: Robust Lexical Features for Improved Neural Network Named-Entity Recognition

has research problem: Neural network approaches to Named-Entity Recognition

has research problem.from sentence: Neural network approaches to Named-Entity Recognition reduce the need for carefully handcrafted features.

has research problem: embeddings are used to extend, rather than replace, hand-crafted features in order to obtain state-of-the-art performance

has research problem.from sentence: Due to the small amount of named-entity annotated data, embeddings are used to extend, rather than replace, hand-crafted features in order to obtain state-of-the-art performance (Lample et al., 2016).
